channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Still Misperceived? A Fresh Look at Bitcoin Volatility
item.description: Is Bitcoin considerably more volatile than other asset classes? It's important to approach this question analytically and with an open mind because perceptions do not always match reality.

item.title: Climate technology forgot the consumer is still king
item.description: We can’t blame consumers for climate change until we give them better options.

item.title: FX Bubbles: Through the Lens of Shiller and Sornette
item.description: The theories and models introduced by Robert Shiller and Didier Sornette are as applicable to the foreign exchange market as they are to the stock market.

item.title: Whether remote, onsite, or hybrid, here’s what really matters at the Best Workplaces in New York, Chicago, Texas, and the Bay Area
item.description: Although employees at a typical U.S. workplace benefit from remote work, trust in their managers and colleagues plays a big role in creating a healthy workplace.

item.title: Book Review: A Wealth of Well-Being
item.description: Finance practitioners can benefit from Meir Statman's challenge to make finance an “afterthought” and spend more time thinking about life well-being.

item.title: We’ll soon live in a world with a ‘staggering’ excess of oil that we can’t fully use, global energy watchdog IEA warns
item.description: Supply will outstrip demand, and the spare capacity will be unlike ever "seen before other than at the height of the Covid-19 lockdowns in 2020,” IEA said.

item.title: What’s Your Client’s Optimal Equity Allocation?
item.description: Note to investment advisors: You may be overestimating the risks of equities for conservative investors with longer investment horizons.

item.title: Larry Ellison's fortune grows $14 billion overnight, making him the seventh-richest person on earth
item.description: As Oracle shares hit record highs after it reveals “largest contracts in our history.”

item.title: Gold and Inflation: An Unstable Relationship
item.description: While there are periods when gold has hedged inflation quite well, beware blanket claims of gold's inflation-hedging utility.

item.title: Instagram boss Adam Mosseri reveals he argued a lot with Mark Zuckerberg in the early years
item.description: Instagram chief Adam Mosseri said Mark Zuckerberg is ‘very results-focused’ and has ‘very high expectations’
